modName: Stones of Barenziah DROPPABLE plus Quest Markers
summary: A combinations of my Stones of Barenziah Quest Markers mod and Sean5861's droppable stones mod. For those that would like the quest markers AND not have an inventory filled with stones.
descriptionHtml:
This mod combines the changes made by my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9385]Stones of Barenziah Quest Markers[/url] modÂ and Sean5861's [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=11530]Droppable Stones of Barenziah[/url] mod.
This mod is made with his permission.

Also available on the Steam Workshop:
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=21283]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=21283[/url]

A french translation thanks to saxofun is available here:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24681]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24681[/url]
A portugese translation thanks to R3v3r3ndo is available here:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35831]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35831[/url]
A polish translation thanks to MrQubo is available here:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/44903]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/44903
[/url]A chinese (traditional) translation thanks to chiousf is available in the downloads.

As the mods both modify the same quest, they were incompatible. Until now!
You will now see quest markers after you talk to Vex, showing you where all the stones are.
In addition, the stones are no longer quest items and can be dropped.

Please note:
1. As a result, the stones now have WEIGHT, so you will WANT to drop them.
2. You will be able to break the quest if you drop them into a respawning container for example. So please don't do that. If you DO break the quest, "setstage tgcrown 30" will fix it.
3. The stones still don't stack unfortunately - the not-stacking is caused by the RENAMING. In fact the quest shows signs that its creator tried to fix the not-stacking problem, but was unsuccessful. Anyway, the main concern is how they clutter up the inventory and this is fixed
4. The stones have no physics - if you drop them in mid-air they will float.

Enjoy!

See also [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49056/]Stackable Stones of Barenziah[/url] (with optional quest markers)

Also check out my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9385]Stones of Barenziah Quest Markers[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14525]Stones of Barenziah DROPPABLE plus Quest Markers[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22647]Dragon Priest Mask Quest Markers[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/69070]East Empire Pendant Quest Markers[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8207]Dime's Quickstart[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15428]Divine Punishment for Mention of Arrows in the Knee[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28001]Daedric Punishment for Insults Related to Sweetrolls[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/69069]Dragon Punishment for Cloud District Quips[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60756]Instant Mining[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61094]Vampire Lord Light[/url]
